turns.ai_line: Doctor, I dey feel strong pain for my belle after I chop leftover rice wey don stay for house. I dey vomit sef and my body dey do me somehow like say I wan purge. I dey live for place wey heat too much and food dey spoil quick quick. Na wetin I fit do?

Doctor, I need help badly. This kind pain wey I dey feel, I never feel am before. Na only small time e dey take before food go spoil for this our area because of the heat. I dey fear say na the rice wey I chop na im dey cause am. I hope say no be something serious.
Doctor, apart from the belle pain, I dey feel like I wan throw up. My body no just dey kajad, I dey stool water every time. I just dey weak. E get any medicine I fit take to stop this one?
